Posts.Content: Dec 16, 2015 10:27AM Essential wrote: My dear lady I was just diagnosed on Dec 2nd. I am also new in this new journey but the feelings of sadness and worries we all share are in my GOD hands. I have a lot hope as one of the menbers sugested get in touch with a good Uncology he will order more test to get all the pieces of the puzzle together and then you will see little by little the light in this tunel. Then look for a good TEAM of doctors in your comunity they can discuss your case and gave you a better idea of your condition and options. Pray and cry with you need to.
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed on Dec 10th Breezy95 Brimton
